Script.name: load files
Script.script:
TReX.load = function()
--local userConfig = TReX.pDir.."TReX_user_config.lua" --if user_config then dofile(userConfig) end
--AFFBAR TReX.serverside.container = Geyser.Container:new({ name = "TReX.serverside.container", x = "0%", y = "97%", width = "110%", height = "2%",
}) TReX.serverside.header = Geyser.HBox:new({ name = "TReX.serverside.header", x = 0, y = "0%", width = "50%", height = "100%", }, TReX.serverside.container) TReX.serverside.title = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "TReX.serverside.title", x = 0, y = 0, width = "50%", height = "100%", }, TReX.serverside.header) TReX.serverside.title:setStyleSheet[[ border-image: url(C:/MudletGFX/chat.png); ]] TReX.serverside.footer=Geyser.Label:new({ name = "TReX.serverside.footer", x = 0, y = "25%", height = "135%", width = "50%", }, TReX.serverside.container) TReX.serverside.footer:setStyleSheet[[ border-image: url(C:/MudletGFX/chat.png); ]] TReX.serverside.middle=Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name = "TReX.serverside.middle", x = "1%", y = "1%", height = "80%", width = "98%", color = "black" }, TReX.serverside.footer)
if t.serverside.settings.affbar then setBorderBottom(27) setMiniConsoleFontSize("TReX.serverside.middle", 12) TReX.serverside.container:show() t.serverside.gmcpAffShow() else setBorderBottom(00) TReX.serverside.container:hide() end
-- store TReX.mDir for system files, so people can use module manager if they wish TReX.mDir = TReX.mDir or getMudletHomeDir() -- default to profile TReX.mSep = TReX.mSep or ""
-- store profile directory as TReX.pDir to save user config files TReX.pDir = TReX.pDir or getMudletHomeDir() TReX.pSep = TReX.pSep or ""
-- flag for whether to use defaults or personal settings local user_config = false
local m = getModulePath("TReX") -- if not m then it's not a module, assume in Mudlet profile (default) if m then m = m:gsub("TReX.xml","") TReX.mDir = m:gsub(m..".xml","") end
-- might need distinct separators for TReX.pDir and TReX.mDir if string.char(TReX.mDir:byte()) == "/" then TReX.mSep = "/" else TReX.mSep = "\\" end if string.char(TReX.pDir:byte()) == "/" then TReX.pSep = "/" else TReX.pSep = "\\" end
if TReX.mDir == TReX.pDir then TReX.mDir = TReX.mDir..TReX.mSep.."TReX"..TReX.mSep end
-- check whether user_config.lua exists in Mudlet profile folder -- if io.exists(TReX.pDir..TReX.pSep.."TReX_user_config.lua") then user_config = true end
-- add files to be imported to the table, loader will automatically pick them up -- don't add any which require extra checks
local versionFile = TReX.mDir.."TReX_version.lua" TReX.config.version = dofile(versionFile) TReX.myVersion = TReX.config.version
TReX.updateAvailable = false TReX.downloadsURL = "https://github.com/shanesrasmussen/TReX-System/releases"
local fTbl = {
TReX.mDir.."TReX_config.lua", -- config, <-- must be first TReX.mDir.."TReX_v.lua", -- vitals tracking TReX.mDir.."TReX_s.lua", -- status tracking TReX.mDir.."TReX_stats.lua", -- sipper TReX.mDir.."TReX_serverside.lua", -- system TReX.mDir.."TReX_defences.lua", -- defence tracking TReX.mDir.."TReX_pipes.lua", -- pipes TReX.mDir.."TReX_class.lua", -- class tracking TReX.mDir.."TReX_inv.lua", -- inventory tracking TReX.mDir.."TReX_u.lua", -- utilities TReX.mDir.."TReX_precache.lua", -- precache TReX.mDir.."TReX_tgt.lua", -- target file TReX.mDir.."TReX_update.lua", -- version update TReX.mDir.."TReX_p.lua", -- people tracker
}
for _,v in ipairs(fTbl) do dofile(v) end
t.serverside.green_echo("Loaded TReX Settings, Version "..TReX.config.version.."\n")
end
TReX.load()
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysLoadEvent", "TReX.load")

Script.name: trex_delay
Script.script:
function trex_delay() if t.affs.aeon then return 2 elseif TReX.serverside.am_hindered() then return 0.5 else return 1 end end
--how to use: tempTimer(trex_delay(), [[variablename = false]])

Script.name: clotting
Script.script:
--still best copy. disabled to update it.
local cc = TReX.config.cc or "##"
TReX.serverside.clot_my_bleeding=function() t.affs["bleed"] = TReX.serverside.bleed_check() if t.affs["bleed"] > 0 then t.affs.bleeding = true if not (table.contains({t.serverside.gmcp_aff_table}, "bleeding")) then table.insert(t.serverside.gmcp_aff_table, "bleeding") end else t.affs.bleeding = false if (table.contains({t.serverside.gmcp_aff_table}, "bleeding")) then table.remove(t.serverside.gmcp_aff_table, table.index_of(t.serverside.gmcp_aff_table, "bleeding")) end end if t.serverside.settings.clot and t.affs.bleeding and t.affs.bleed > tonumber(t.serverside["settings_default"].clot_at) then TReX.serverside.clotcalc() end end
TReX.serverside.clotcalc = function()
t.inv["magirobes"] = t.inv["magirobes"] or false -- gmcp check for magi robes and calculates accordingly
local magirobesmult = 1 if t.inv["magirobes"] then magirobesmult = .66 end
local classreference = {priest = {bleed = 2000, mana = .8}, dualc = {bleed = 2000, mana = .2}, shaman = {bleed = 140, mana = .8}, apostate = {bleed = 2000, mana = .7}, blademaster = {bleed = 70, mana = 0}, water = {bleed = 70, mana = 0}} local bleeddanger = 0 local manadanger = 0 local manaperclot = 60 * magirobesmult -- not sure local bleedperclot = 30 local mana = TReX.stats.m local maxmana = TReX.stats.maxm local clotmana = (t.affs.bleed - t.serverside["settings_default"].clot_at)*(manaperclot/bleedperclot)
if not (t.serverside.clotcd) then t.serverside.clotcd = 0 --add to trex table end
if t.serverside.clotcd < os.clock () then -- cecho("pinged the clot function") t.serverside.clotcd = os.clock() + 0.5
for v,k in ipairs(classreference) do if t.class[v].enabled then bleeddanger = k.bleed manadanger = k.mana end end
local dangerflag = false
if (mana - clotmana)/maxmana < manadanger then availablemana = mana - dangermana possibleclot = (mana - dangermana)/manaperclot dangerflag = true else possibleclot = clotmana/manaperclot end
if t.affs.bleed > bleeddanger and dangerflag then local bleedrequested = t.affs.bleed - bleeddanger possibleclot = bleedrequested/bleedperclot end
local clotstring = "" clotcount = 0 tenclots = 0 if math.floor (possibleclot) > 0 then for i = 1, math.floor(possibleclot), 1 do clotstring = clotstring ..cc.."clot" clotcount = clotcount + 1 if clotcount > 9 then clotcount = 0 tenclots = tenclots + 1 clotstring = ""
end
end end
t.serverside.bleedcd = os.clock() + .5 if not(clotstring == "") then t.serverside.bleedcd = os.clock() + .5 if not t.affs.haemophilia then
for i = 1, tenclots, 1 do
t.send("clot"..cc.."clot"..cc.."clot"..cc.."clot"..cc.."clot"..cc.."clot"..cc.."clot"..cc.."clot"..cc.."clot"..cc.."clot")
end
t.send(clotstring) end end
end end

Script.name: retardation
Script.script: t.send=function(line, boolean) if TReX.serverside.inslowcuringmode() then if not t.serverside["settings"].paused then if boolean ~= nil then send(line, boolean) else sendAll(line) end end else if not t.affs.stun and not t.serverside["settings"].paused then if boolean ~= nil then send(line, boolean) else sendAll(line) end end end end

Script.name: transmute
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function calctrans()
local returnstring = "" local maxhp = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) local hp = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) local maxmana = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp) local mana = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp)
if hp < transmutehp then
hpneeded = transmutehp - hp
if mana - hpneeded < manathreshold then
hpneeded = mana - manathreshold
end
returnstring = calculatetransmuteamount(hpneeded)
if not(string.find(returnstring, "transmute")) then
returnstring = ""
end
end
return returnstring
end
function transmoote()
transmutehp = 4500 --- amount of health you want to transmute to manathreshold = 500 --- dont drop below this mana level if not(calctrans () == "") then
send("queue add eqbal "..calctrans()) else
end end
function calculatetransmuteamount(amount)
local producedstring = ""
while amount > 0 do
if amount > 1000 then
producedstring = producedstring.."|transmute 1000" amount = amount - 1000 else
producedstring = producedstring.."|transmute ".. math.floor(amount)
amount = 0
end
end
return producedstring
end

Script.name: save settings
Script.script:
TReX.config.loadSettings=function()
local _sep if string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" then _sep = "/" else _sep = "\\" end
local configDir = getMudletHomeDir() local _save = { ["t.config"] = t.config, ["TReX.affs2tree"] = TReX.affs2tree, ["t.serverside.settings"] = t.serverside.settings, ["t.serverside.settings_default"] = t.serverside.settings_default, ["t.serverside.settings_dict"] = t.serverside.settings_dict, ["TReX.precache.minerals"] = TReX.precache.minerals, ["TReX.precache.herbs"] = TReX.precache.herbs, ["TReX.prios.default"] = TReX.prios.default, ["t.lust.whitelist"] = t.lust.whitelist, ["class_skill"] = class_skill, ["mount_list"] = mount_list, ["t.stats"] = t.stats, ["t.file"] = t.file, ["t.inv"] = t.inv, }
for file, myTable in pairs(_save) do if (io.exists(configDir .._sep .. file .. ".lua")) then table.load(configDir .._sep .. file .. ".lua", myTable) end end
if t.serverside["settings"].sys_loaded then t.serverside.green_echo("System File Loaded\n", false) elseif not t.serverside["settings"].installed then t.serverside.green_echo("System File Loaded\n", false) end end
TReX.config.saveSettings=function()
local _sep if string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" then _sep = "/" else _sep = "\\" end
local configDir = getMudletHomeDir() local _save = { ["t.config"] = t.config, ["TReX.affs2tree"] = TReX.affs2tree, ["t.serverside.settings"] = t.serverside.settings, ["t.serverside.settings_default"] = t.serverside.settings_default, ["t.serverside.settings_dict"] = t.serverside.settings_dict, ["TReX.precache.minerals"] = TReX.precache.minerals, ["TReX.precache.herbs"] = TReX.precache.herbs, ["TReX.prios.default"] = TReX.prios.default, ["t.lust.whitelist"] = t.lust.whitelist, ["class_skill"] = class_skill, ["mount_list"] = mount_list, ["t.stats"] = t.stats, ["t.file"] = t.file, ["t.inv"] = t.inv, }
for file, myTable in pairs(_save) do table.save(configDir .._sep .. file .. ".lua", myTable) end
if t.serverside["settings"].sys_loaded then t.serverside.green_echo("System File Saved\n", false) elseif not t.serverside["settings"].installed then t.serverside.green_echo("System File Saved\n", false) end end

Script.name: cpu functions
Script.script:
function findkey(list, item)
for v,k in pairs(list) do
if v == item then
return true
end
end
return false
end
function keyfind(list, item)
return findkey(list, item)
end
function listfind(list,var, vartwo )
local re = false
for i = 1, #list, 1 do
if list[i] == var then
re = true
if vartwo then
re = i
end
end
end
return re
end
function randomlist(list)
return list[math.random(1, #list)]
end
function flip(var)
if var == true then
return false
else
return true
end
end
function ts(var)
if var < os.clock() then
return true
else
return false
end
end

Script.name: TReX_alert
Script.script:
function TReX_alert()
mmp.firstAlert = false
if mmp.alertness ~= nil and mmp.alertness and next(mmp.alertness) then
local dirs = {} for direction, _ in pairs(mmp.alertness) do dirs[#dirs+1] = direction end local people = select(2, next(mmp.alertness)) or {}
cecho("\n<red>[<cyan>" .. table.concat(dirs, ', ') .. " <red>-"..(#dirs > 1 and (" ") or '').." <white>" .. table.concat(people, ', ') .. "<cyan> ("..#people..")<red>]") mmp.alertness = nil raiseEvent("mmapper updated pdb")
end
disableTrigger"TReX Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger"
end

Script.name: gmcp_prompt_check
Script.script: function gmcp_prompt_check() if t.serverside.settings.sys_loaded then --if (gmcp.Room ~= nil) and (gmcp.Char ~=nil) then --if (currentroom ~= gmcp.Room.Info.num) or (gmcp.Char and gmcp.Char ~= nil) then if (gmcp.Char ~=nil) then if (gmcp.Char and gmcp.Char ~= nil) then TReX_Prompt_Trigger_Request = true --set current room --currentroom = gmcp.Room.Info.num end end end end

Script.name: prompt_capture
Script.script:
function prompt_capture() --right here.
if table.contains({prompt_sent}, "sent") and not deletep_request then --if table.contains({prompt_sent}, "sent") then deletep=false TReX.stats.custom_prompt() elseif deletep_request then deletep = true deletep_request = false if table.contains({prompt_sent}, "sent") then table.remove(prompt_sent, table.index_of(prompt_sent, "sent")) end end
end

Script.name: inventory
Script.script:
--[[ INSTRUCTIONS: enter into mudlet cmd bar: 'tlua TReX.inv.inv ' you can find your available 'known' inventory in this table. REMOVE TRIGGER: Remove this trigger into your PERSONAL triggers B4 you update the system. ]]
TReX.inv.set_id_table = function()
t.inv = t.inv or {}
--project for later --t.inv.mount = {"a scarred scorpion","a magnificent kelpie","a dreadful chimera"} for k,v in pairs(TReX.inv.inv) do --pack
-- DECAYABLES if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("armour")) then t.inv["armour"]={name="armour", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("backstrap")) then t.inv["backstrap"]={name="backstrap", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a crafted bamboo pipe")) then t.inv["tabac"]={name="tabac", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a finely carved heartwood pot")) then t.inv["pot"]={name="pot", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a throwing axe")) then t.inv["handaxe"]={name="handaxe", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("kitbag")) then t.inv["kitbag"]={name="kitbag", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("bag of stasis")) then t.inv["bag"]={name="bag", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a bard's lyre")) then t.inv["lyre"]={name="lyre", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
--NON DECAY
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a rugged satchel of crocodile hide")) then t.inv["pack"]={name="pack", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("an Odyssean tongue")) then t.inv["tongue"]={name="tongue", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a spiralled loop of mortal coil")) then t.inv["loop"]={name="mortal coil", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a vulture's talon")) then t.inv["talon"]={name="talon", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("some gold sovereigns")) then t.inv["coins"]={name="coins", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("Robes of the Magi")) then t.inv["magirobes"]={name="magirobes", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("Absorption")) then t.inv["soa"]={name="soa", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a sharpened Logosmas tree trunk")) then t.inv["pike"]={name="pike", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a bone vial etched with runes")) then t.inv["bonevial"]={name="bonevial", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("an elegant diamond vial")) then t.inv["artyvial"]={name="artyvial", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a Soulpiercer")) then t.inv["a Soulpiercer"]={name="a Soulpiercer", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a Cane of the Quickening")) then t.inv["cane"]={name="cane", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a mithril spear")) then t.inv["behead"]={name="behead", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a scrying bowl")) then t.inv["scrybowl"]={name="scrybowl", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=false, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
--QUIVERS
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a dragonskin quiver")) then t.inv["quiver"]={name="quiver", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a personal journal")) then t.inv["journal"]={name="personal journal", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a fire pendant")) then t.inv["pendant"]={name="fire pendant", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} ---print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a shackle of Garash")) then t.inv["shackle"]={name="shackle", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} ---print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a Mayan ring")) then t.inv["healthsipring"]={name="health sip ring", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a pair of eagle's wings")) then t.inv["wings"]={name="wings", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("an Aldar talisman")) then t.inv["diadem"]={name="diadem", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=true, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end
if table.index_of({"Druid","Sylvan"}, TReX.s.class) then if string.find(v.name, string.genNocasePattern("a vine-wreathed sylvanic quarterstaff")) then t.inv["staff"]={name="staff", id=tonumber(k), attrib=v.attrib, arte=false, worn=true, enabled=true} --print(v.name) end end
end -- for k, v
end -- func

Script.name: buy inks by tattoo
Script.script:
local tattoos = { ["cloak"] = {"3 blue"}, ["mindseye"] = {"2 blue","1 green"}, ["tree"] = {"5 green"}, ["boar"] = {"1 purple","2 red"}, ["web"] = {"1 green","1 yellow"}, ["moon"] = {"1 blue","1 red","1 yellow"}, ["shield"] = {"1 green","2 red"}, ["moss"] = {"1 blue","1 red","1 yellow"}, ["crystal"] = {"1 green","1 purple","1 yellow"}, ["bell"] = {"3 blue","2 red"}, ["prism"] = {"1 green","1 purple","1 yellow","1 blue","1 red"}, ["tentacle"] = {"2 green","1 purple"}, ["hourglass"] = {"2 blue","2 yellow"}, ["brazier"] = {"2 red","2 yellow"}, ["megalith"] = {"2 gold"}, ["ox"] = {"1 gold","1 yellow","1 blue","1 red"}, ["chameleon"] = {"1 gold","1 yellow","1 purple"}, ["hammer"] = {"1 purple","2 red"}, ["starburst"] = {"1 green","1 purple","1 yellow","1 blue","1 red","1 gold"}, ["prism"] = {"1 green","1 purple","1 yellow","1 blue","1 red"}, ["hunt"] = {"1 green","1 purple","3 yellow"}, ["reup"] = {"5 green","5 purple","5 yellow","5 blue","5 red","5 gold"},
}
TReX.u.getInks=function(tattoo) if tattoos[tattoo:lower()] then --check rune spelling for k,v in ipairs(tattoos[tattoo]) do send(string.format("outr %sink",v)) --outrift inks end--for
end--if1 end--func
TReX.u.buyInks=function(tattoo) t.send("get coins from pack") if tattoos[tattoo:lower()] then --check rune spelling for k,v in ipairs(tattoos[tattoo]) do send(string.format("buy %sink",v)) --buy inks end--for t.send("put gold in satchel") end--if1 end--func

Script.name: soundTrack
soundFile
Script.script:
function playList:sysLoadEvent() playList.on = false -- set to false if you dont want to hear the music on login if playList.on then playSoundFile([[C:\Users\Shane\.config\mudlet\profiles
ehmrah\TReX\AchaeanMusic.mp3]]) end end
function playList:playList() stopSounds() --for _,v in pairs({"Swamp","River","Hills","Forest","Garden","Natural underground","Mountains","Grasslands","Jungle","Desert","Ocean","Freshwater","Valley"}) do -- if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == v then -- playSoundFile(getMudletHomeDir().. [[/TReX/]]..v..[[.mp3]]) -- else playSoundFile(getMudletHomeDir().. [[/TReX/AchaeanMusic.mp3]]) -- end -- end end
function playList.toggle(mode) if mode == "on" then playList.on = true enableTimer("playList") cecho("
<white>Playlist On
") raiseEvent("playList") --ragestatus:show() play list gui menu? else playList.on = false disableTimer("playList") cecho("
<white>Playlist Off
") stopSounds() --ragestatus:hide() play list gui menu? end end

Script.name: usage statistics
Script.script:
-- http://exiva.aucula.net:8000/trex
trex_sent_usage_stats = false
function tick_usage_stats(event) if trex_sent_usage_stats then return end
if event == "gmcp.Char.Status" then trex_sent_usage_stats = true
local name = gmcp.Char.Status.name downloadFile(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/trexstats", "http://exiva.aucula.net:8000/trex/" .. name .. "/" .. TReX.myVersion) end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Status", "tick_usage_stats")

Script.name: peopletracker
Script.script:
local labels = {}
-- default to numerals when we run out -- while defining this as a function would be nicer, it's easier for most people to mod if it's in this format local multiplegroups = {"a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "f", "g", "h", "i", "j", "k", "l", "m", "n", "o", "p", "q", "r", "s", "t", "u", "v", "w", "x", "y", "z"}
clean_old_labels = function() for areanum, arealabels in pairs(labels) do for _, label in pairs(arealabels) do deleteMapLabel(areanum, label) end end labels = {} end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysExitEvent", "clean_old_labels")
clear_labels = function() if not mmp then return end local function clearlabels(areaid) local t = getMapLabels(areaid) if type(t) ~= "table" then return end
local starts, ends = string.starts, string.ends for labelid, text in pairs(t) do if starts(text, '(') and ends(text, ')') then deleteMapLabel(areaid, labelid) end end end
for areaid in pairs(mmp.areatabler or {}) do clearlabels(areaid) end end
update_people_labels = function () local s,m = pcall(function() if not mmp then return end -- build a 'location = people' reverse map local r = {} -- keeps track at which index of multiplegroups are we at local multiplescount = 1
local fr,fg,fb = unpack(color_table.white) local br,bg,bb = unpack(color_table.black)
for k,v in pairs(mmp.pdb) do if mmp.pdb_lastupdate[k] then r[v] = r[v] or {}; r[v][#r[v]+1] = k end end
clean_old_labels() if not mmp.pdb_lastupdate or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then return end
local getRoomArea, createMapLabel, getRoomCoordinates, concat, sort = getRoomArea, createMapLabel, getRoomCoordinates, table.concat, table.sort
-- if we have a unique location, draw fancy labels in all rooms on 60% opacity for room, persons in pairs(r) do sort(persons) local ids = mmp.getnums(room, true)
-- multiples? special case then. Current method implemented is #3 if ids and #ids >1 and #ids <= 3 then -- make a table of roomid = {x,y,z} -- in a separate variable, track the right-most room ID and x coordinate per-Z level local coords, rightmost = {}, {} for _, exactroomid in pairs(ids) do coords[exactroomid] = {getRoomCoordinates(exactroomid)} coords[exactroomid][4] = getRoomArea(exactroomid)
if not rightmost[coords[exactroomid][3]] or coords[exactroomid][1] >= rightmost[coords[exactroomid][3]][1] then -- >= so rightmostroom is set at least once
rightmost[coords[exactroomid][3]] = {coords[exactroomid][1], exactroomid} -- we don't account for the Y coordinate if the X's are the same atm, though end end
-- now, draw! for roomid, l in pairs(coords) do local area = l[4] labels[area] = labels[area] or {}
if rightmost[l[3]] and roomid == rightmost[l[3]][2] then -- doesn't account for multiplescount overflowing atm labels[area][#labels[area]+1] = createMapLabel(area, '('..multiplegroups[multiplescount].." "..concat(persons, ", ")..')', l[1],l[2],l[3], fr, fg, fb, br, bg, bb, 0, 12) else labels[area][#labels[area]+1] = createMapLabel(area, '('..multiplegroups[multiplescount]..')', l[1],l[2],l[3], fr, fg, fb, br, bg, bb, 0, 12) end end multiplescount = multiplescount +1
elseif ids and #ids == 1 then local x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(ids[1]) local area = getRoomArea(ids[1])
if area then -- somehow area can still be returned as nil labels[area] = labels[area] or {}
labels[area][#labels[area]+1] = createMapLabel(area, '('..concat(persons, ", ")..')', x,y,z, fr, fg, fb, br, bg, bb, 0, 12) end end end end)
if not s then echoLink("(e!)", string.format("echo([=[The problem was: %q]=])", m), 'Oy - there was a problem with the peopletracker. Click on this link and submit a bug report with what it says.') end end
refresh_labels = function() clear_labels() update_people_labels() end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("mmapper updated pdb", "refresh_labels")

Script.name: tables
rotation
Script.script:
--Nehmrahs Combo Rotation Check TReX.hunting.rotation=function()
if TReX.s.class == "Dragon" then if TReX.hunting.denizen_shield and not TReX.hunting.deadtarget then if TReX.hunting.frostrive and TReX.hunting.rage >= 17 then if not t.affs.prone and not t.affs.stun then send("cq all##frostrive "..target) --t.serverside.green_echo("Frostrive Queued") end else if not t.affs.prone and not t.affs.stun then send("cq all##queue add eqbal tailsmash "..target) --t.serverside.green_echo("Tailsmash Queued") end end else if not t.affs.prone and not t.affs.stun then send("cq all##queue add eqbal gut "..target) --t.serverside.green_echo("Gut Queued") end end end
end

Script.name: variables
roomTrack
Script.script:
huntTracker = huntTracker or {}
function roomTrack(event) if huntVar.on then local eventMatch = event:match("%w+$") local funcMatch = loadstring("huntTracker:"..eventMatch.."()") funcMatch() end end

Script.name: functions
Script.script:
-- Tracker functions function huntTracker:Add()
if gmcp.Char.Items.Add.location == "room" then local tempTable = gmcp.Char.Items.Add.item if tempTable.attrib == "m" and table.contains(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, tempTable.name) then local addID = tempTable.id for k, v in ipairs(huntVar.userAreaDenizens) do if tempTable.name == v then insertID(addID, k) break end end if huntVar.targetGone then targetSet() end end end end
function huntTracker:Remove() if gmcp.Char.Items.Remove.location == "room" then local removeID = gmcp.Char.Items.Remove.item.id if huntVar.currentTarget == removeID then huntVar.targetGone = true if table.size(huntVar.targetQueue) >= 1 then targetSet() end -- end if table.size elseif table.contains(huntVar.targetQueue, removeID) then for k,v in pairs(huntVar.targetQueue) do if v == removeID then table.remove(huntVar.targetQueue, k) table.remove(huntVar.targetPriority, k) if target ~= huntVar.currentTarget then huntVar.targetGone = true insertID(huntVar.currentTarget, huntVar.currentPriority) targetSet() end break end -- end if v == removeID end -- end for k,v end -- end if huntVar.currentTarget == removeID end -- end if location == "room" end -- end function huntTracker:Remove()
function huntTracker:List() if gmcp.Char.Items.List.location == "room" then local tempTable = gmcp.Char.Items.List local size = table.size(tempTable.items) local targGot = false local targChange = true huntVar.targetGone = true huntVar.targetQueue = {} huntVar.targetPriority = {} for k,v in ipairs(tempTable.items) do local tempID = v.id if v.attrib == "m" and table.contains(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, v.name) then for ak, av in ipairs(huntVar.userAreaDenizens) do if huntVar.currentTarget == tempID then huntVar.targetGone = false targChange = false end -- end if huntVar.currentTarget if v.name == av and huntVar.currentTarget ~=tempID and not table.contains(huntVar.targetQueue, tempID) then insertID(tempID, ak) break end -- end if v.name end -- end for ak end -- end v.attrib end -- end for k if targChange then targetSet() end end -- end if location end -- end function huntTracker:List()
function huntTracker:Info() if huntVar.currentArea ~= gmcp.Room.Info.area then huntVar.currentArea = gmcp.Room.Info.area if not table.contains(huntVar.userAreaList, huntVar.currentArea) and table.contains(fixedHuntVar.areaList, huntVar.currentArea) then table.insert(huntVar.userAreaList, huntVar.currentArea) huntVar.userAreaList[huntVar.currentArea] = huntTableCopy(fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea]) elseif not table.contains(fixedHuntVar.areaList, huntVar.currentArea) then fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea] = {} huntVar.userAreaList[huntVar.currentArea] = {} end fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens = fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea] huntVar.userAreaDenizens = huntVar.userAreaList[huntVar.currentArea] or {} huntTracker:List() end end -- end function huntTracker:Info()
--function huntTrackerload() function huntTracker:sysLoadEvent() local sep local homeDir = getMudletHomeDir() if string.char(homeDir:byte()) == "/" then sep = "/" else sep = "\\" end table.load(homeDir.. sep .. huntVar.fileName..".lua", huntVar.userAreaList) table.load(homeDir.. sep .. huntVar.fileNameFull..".lua", fixedHuntVar.areaList) huntTableCheck() t.serverside.green_echo("<white>Hunting System Loaded\n") --huntVar.on = false end
function huntTracker:sysExitEvent() huntTableCheck() local sep local homeDir = getMudletHomeDir() if string.char(homeDir:byte()) == "/" then sep = "/" else sep = "\\" end table.save(homeDir.. sep .. huntVar.fileName..".lua", huntVar.userAreaList) table.save(homeDir.. sep .. huntVar.fileNameFull..".lua", fixedHuntVar.areaList) t.serverside.green_echo("Hunting System Saved\n") end
function insertID(id, priority) local tableSize = table.size(huntVar.targetPriority) local inserted = false if not table.contains(huntVar.targetQueue, id) then if tableSize == 0 then table.insert(huntVar.targetQueue, id) table.insert(huntVar.targetPriority, priority) end if tableSize > 0 then for i = 1, tableSize do if priority < huntVar.targetPriority[i] then table.insert(huntVar.targetQueue, i, id) table.insert(huntVar.targetPriority, i, priority) inserted = true break end -- end if priority end -- end for if not inserted then table.insert(huntVar.targetQueue, id) table.insert(huntVar.targetPriority, priority) end -- end if inserted = false end -- end if not table.contains end -- end if tableSize end -- end function
function targetSet() if not gmcp.IRE then sendGMCP("Core.Supports.Add [\"IRE.Target 1\"]") end
if not table.is_empty(huntVar.targetQueue) then huntVar.currentTarget = huntVar.targetQueue[1] huntVar.currentPriority = huntVar.targetPriority[1] table.remove(huntVar.targetQueue, 1) table.remove(huntVar.targetPriority, 1) target = huntVar.currentTarget send("settarget "..target) huntVar.targetGone = false
if auto_hunt_on then if not huntVar.on then huntVar.on = true end if not huntVar.targetGone then TReX.hunting.denizen_shield = false t.serverside.green_echo("<green>[<white>Data<green>]<white>: Level: <green>"..gmcp.Char.Status.level) TReX.hunting.rotation() else t.serverside.green_echo("Room Cleared", false) end end
if huntVar.echo then if huntVar.echoto == "" then return else send(huntVar.echoto.." Target: "..target) end end
end end
function showHuntTargs() if table.contains(fixedHuntVar.areaList, huntVar.currentArea) and table.size(fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea]) > 0 then for i, j in ipairs(fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens) do local check = " " local raise = " " local lower = " " local checked = false if table.contains(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, j) then check = " X " checked = true end cecho("<dark_slate_gray>[") fg("white") echoLink(check, "toggleTarget(\""..j.."\")", "Click to add or remove "..j.." from the list!", true) cecho("<dark_slate_gray>] [") if i > 1 then raise = " ^ " echoLink(raise, "swapPriority("..i..", "..i.."-1)", "Click to move "..j.." up the priority list!", true) else echo(raise) end cecho("<dark_slate_gray>] [") if i < table.maxn(fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens) then lower = " v " echoLink(lower, "swapPriority("..i..", "..i.."+1)", "Click to move "..j.." down the priority list.", true) else echo(lower) end cecho("<dark_slate_gray>] ") if checked then cecho("<white>"..j.."\n") else cecho("<light_slate_grey>"..j.."\n") end end cecho("<dark_slate_gray>[") fg("green") echoLink(" Check All ", "toggleAll(\"on\")", "Click to check all targets in the area", true) cecho("<dark_slate_gray>] [") fg("red") echoLink(" Uncheck All ", "toggleAll(\"off\")", "Click to check all targets in the area", true) cecho("<dark_slate_gray>]\n") send(" ") else cecho("<white>No hunting list found for this area!\n") end end
function toggleTarget(name) if table.contains(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, name) then for k, v in ipairs(huntVar.userAreaDenizens) do if v == name then table.remove(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, k) end end else local position = 0 for i, j in ipairs(fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens) do if j == name then table.insert(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, position+1, name) elseif table.contains(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, j) then position = position + 1 end end end showHuntTargs() end
function swapPriority(numToSwap, num) local tempName = "" if fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens[numToSwap] == huntVar.userAreaDenizens[numToSwap] and fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens[num] == huntVar.userAreaDenizens[num] then tempName = huntVar.userAreaDenizens[numToSwap] huntVar.userAreaDenizens[numToSwap] = huntVar.userAreaDenizens[num] huntVar.userAreaDenizens[num] = tempName end tempName = fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens[numToSwap] fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens[numToSwap] = fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens[num] fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens[num] = tempName showHuntTargs() end
function toggleAll(mode) if mode == "on" then for k, v in ipairs(fixedHuntVar.areaDenizens) do if huntVar.userAreaDenizens[k] ~= v then table.insert(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, k, v) end end else for i = 1, table.maxn(huntVar.userAreaDenizens) do table.remove(huntVar.userAreaDenizens, 1) end end showHuntTargs() end
function huntTableCheck() for k, v in pairs(areaList) do if not table.contains(huntVar.userAreaList, k) then fixedHuntVar.areaList[k] = huntTableCopy(areaList[k]) huntVar.userAreaList[k] = huntTableCopy(areaList[k]) end end end
function huntTableCopy(t) local t2 = {} for k,v in pairs(t) do t2[k] = v end return t2 end
function huntToggle(mode)
ragestatus = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "ragestatus", x = "46%", y = "93.25%", width = "8%", height = "3%", },main)
ragebox = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "ragebox", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", },ragestatus)
ragestatus2 = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "ragestatus2", },ragebox)
t.stats = t.stats or {} t.stats.battle_rage = t.stats.battle_rage or {}
if not gmcp.IRE then sendGMCP("Core.Supports.Add [\"IRE.Target 1\"]") sendGMCP("Core.Supports.Add [\"Char.Status.class 1\"]") end
if mode == "on" then
if TReX.s.class == "Dragon" then TReX.hunting.dragonchill=true TReX.hunting.ague=true TReX.hunting.glaciate=true TReX.hunting.override=true TReX.hunting.frostwave=true TReX.hunting.frostrive=true end
ragewindow=ragewindow or false --if matches[2] == nil and huntVar.on then if not ragewindow then
TReX.hunting.rage = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats[2]:sub(7)) ragestatus:show() ragestatus2:echo("Rage = "..TReX.hunting.rage,"green","cb15") ragewindow = true
end
huntVar.on = true t.stats["battle_rage"].enabled = true raiseEvent("TReX prompt") t.serverside.green_echo("Hunting Script On\n")
else
if TReX.class == "Dragon" then TReX.hunting.dragonchill=false TReX.hunting.ague=false TReX.hunting.glaciate=false TReX.hunting.override=false TReX.hunting.frostwave=false TReX.hunting.frostrive=false end
ragewindow = false huntVar.on = false t.stats["battle_rage"].enabled = false raiseEvent("TReX prompt") t.serverside.green_echo("Hunting Script Off\n") ragestatus:hide()
end end
function addTargets() cecho("<white>Denizens that can be added:") for k, v in ipairs(gmcp.Char.Items.List.items) do if v.attrib == "m" then if not table.contains(fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea], v.name) then local add = " + " cecho("\n<dark_slate_gray>[") echoLink(add, [[addTarg("]]..v.name..[[")]], "Click to add "..v.name.." to the denizen table!", true) cecho("<dark_slate_gray>] <white>"..v.name) end end end send(" ") end
function addTarg(fullName) table.insert(fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea], fullName) table.insert(huntVar.userAreaList[huntVar.currentArea], fullName) addTargets() end
function removeTargets() cecho("<white>Denizens that can be removed:") for k, v in ipairs(fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea]) do local remove = " - " cecho("\n<dark_slate_gray>[") echoLink(remove, [[removeTarg("]]..v..[[")]], "Click to remove "..v.." from the denizen table!", true) cecho("<dark_slate_gray>] <white>"..v) end send(" ") end
function removeTarg(name) local index = table.index_of(fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea], name) table.remove(fixedHuntVar.areaList[huntVar.currentArea], index) table.remove(huntVar.userAreaList[huntVar.currentArea], index) removeTargets() end
clearTarget = function() if gmcp.IRE.Target and gmcp.IRE.Target.Set ~= "" then t.serverside.green_echo("Clearing Target") sendGMCP('IRE.Target.Set "0"') end end

Script.name: area list
area list
gold-grabber
Script.script:
--Gold Reset Function TReX.shinies.Gold_Reset = function() TReX.shinies.GetGold = false TReX.shinies.TargetSlain = false TReX.shinies.GoldAmount = 0 TReX.shinies.TotalGold = 0 TReX.shinies.GoldGoals = 0 TReX.shinies.GoldGoal = 1000 TReX.shinies.GoldAway = false t.serverside.green_echo("<green>TReX<gold> Gold<green> Retriever Reset<white>.") end
--Get Gold Function TReX.shinies.Get_Gold = function() if TReX.shinies.TargetSlain and TReX.shinies.GetGold then send("queue prepend eqbal take coins "..(TReX.config.cc or "##").." put coins in " .. t.inv["pack"].id) end end
--Gold Goals Function TReX.shinies.Gold_Goals = function() if not TReX.shinies.GoldGoals then TReX.shinies.Gold_Reset() end end
--Gold Grabbed Function TReX.shinies.Gold_Grabbed = function() if TReX.shinies.GoldAway then TReX.shinies.TotalGold = TReX.shinies.TotalGold + TReX.shinies.GoldAmount t.serverside.green_echo("<green>You Have Collected <white>-<gold> " ..TReX.shinies.TotalGold.." <white>/<gold> "..TReX.shinies.GoldGoal.."<green> So Far<white>!") TReX.shinies.TargetSlain = false TReX.shinies.GoldAmount = 0 end end
--Gold Goal Function TReX.shinies.Gold_Goal = function() if TReX.shinies.TotalGold >= TReX.shinies.GoldGoal then TReX.shinies.GoldGoal = math.round(TReX.shinies.GoldGoal*.25+TReX.shinies.GoldGoal) TReX.shinies.GoldGoals = TReX.shinies.GoldGoals +1 t.serverside.green_echo("<green>Goal Complete<white>!<gold> Gold<green> Goal<white>!<green> Your New Goal Is <white> - <gold>"..TReX.shinies.GoldGoal.."<white> -<green> Good Luck<white>!") end end
--Alias Function ( Total Gold) TReX.shinies.Total_Gold = function() t.serverside.green_echo("<green>Total Gold <white>[<gold>" ..TReX.shinies.TotalGold.. "<white>]<green> Current Goal Is<white> [<gold>" ..TReX.shinies.GoldGoal.. "<white>] - <green> Goals Completed <white>-[<cyan>" ..TReX.shinies.GoldGoals.. "<white>]") end
--Help File TReX.shinies.Retriever_Help = function() t.serverside.green_echo("<white>Welcome to TReX Hunters Lounge<white>!") t.serverside.green_echo("<white>If You Are Having A Problem With The Gold Retriever") t.serverside.green_echo("<white>Please Use The Alias <cyan>goldbug <white>(write the issue you are having)") t.serverside.green_echo("<white>This Will Instantly Report Any Issues To Nehmrah!") t.serverside.green_echo("<white>You May Also Want To Try <cyan>goldreset<gold> First Though!") t.serverside.green_echo("<white>The Other Helpful Aliases are <cyan>goldgoal <white>(Insert number here)-(Example:goldgoal 1000)<gold>") t.serverside.green_echo("<white>As well As <cyan>gold<gold> To See Your Current Progress!") end

Script.name: zgainedaff
Script.script:
local hinderAfflictions = { "prone", "stun", "blackout", "paralysis", "entangled", "webbed", "transfixation", "impaled", "bound", "brokenrightarm", "mangledrightarm", "brokenrightleg", "mangledrightleg", "brokenleftarm", "mangledleftarm", "brokenleftleg", "mangledleftleg", }
zgainedaff = function(event, aff) if huntVar.on then if event:find("gained aff") then if table.contains({hinderAfflictions}, aff) then t.serverside.green_echo("Hinder Aff Gained") t.serverside.green_echo("<white>Clearing Queues") if aff == "blackout" then if not t.affs.prone and not t.affs.stun then TReX.hunting.rotation() end else send("cq eqbal", false) end end -- if aff matches aff from list end -- if event = gained aff end-- in hunting on
if huntVar.on and t.affs.bleed > 0 and TReX.stats.h > .75 then if t.serverside["settings_default"].mana_threshold ~= 0 then t.serverside["settings_default"].mana_threshold=0 t.send("curing priority mana", false) t.send("curing manathreshold 0", false) end end
end-- func

Script.name: zlostaff
Script.script:
local hinderAfflictions = { "prone", "stun", "blackout", "paralysis", "entangled", "webbed", "transfixation", "impaled", "bound", "brokenrightarm", "mangledrightarm", "brokenrightleg", "mangledrightleg", "brokenleftarm", "mangledleftarm", "brokenleftleg", "mangledleftleg", }
zlostaff = function(event, aff) if huntVar.on then if event:find("lost aff") then if not targetGone then if table.contains({hinderAfflictions}, aff) then t.serverside.green_echo("Hinder Aff Lost") if not t.affs.prone and not t.affs.stun and not huntVar.targetGone then TReX.hunting.rotation() end end -- if target in room else t.serverside.green_echo("Room Cleared", false) end -- if table contains aff lost end -- if lost affliciton event end -- if hunting on
-- this is for hunting system only. if huntVar.on and t.affs.bleed > 0 and TReX.stats.h > .75 then if t.serverside["settings_default"].mana_threshold ~= 0 then t.serverside["settings_default"].mana_threshold=0 t.send("curing priority mana", false) t.send("curing manathreshold 0", false) end end
end -- func

--TReX.prios.current=TReX.prios.default
function burnapply()
local hppercent = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) /tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp)
if hppercent < (t.affs.burn) * .25 then
return true
else
return false
end
end

Script.name: lostaff
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- lostaff = function(event, aff) if not t.serverside.settings.sys_loaded then return end if t.serverside["settings"].installed then raiseEvent("trackable_event lost") --TReX.serverside.am_hindered() create a special prio check for this one. if event:find("lost aff") then
if (aff == "retardation") then t.retard.mode = "actions" for k, v in pairs(TReX.prios.default) do --if t.affs[v] then if TReX.prios.current[k] ~= TReX.prios.default[k] then TReX.prios.switchPrios(k,TReX.prios.default[k]) end --end end end
if (aff == "aeon") then
requestaeon = false
send("CURING BATCH ON", false) send("CURING DEFENCES ON", false) send("CURING SIPHEALTH " ..t.serverside["settings_default"].sip_health_at, false) send("CURING SIPMANA " ..t.serverside["settings_default"].sip_mana_at, false) send("CURING MOSSHEALTH " ..t.serverside["settings_default"].moss_health_at, false) send("CURING MOSSMANA " ..t.serverside["settings_default"].moss_mana_at, false)
if t.serverside["settings_default"].clot_at ~= 70 then t.serverside["settings_default"].clot_at = 70 end
for k, v in pairs(TReX.prios.default) do TReX.prios.switchPrios(k,TReX.prios.default[k]) end
end -- if aeon
if aff=="mangledleftarm" then TReX.serverside.affadd("damagedleftarm") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("damagedleftarm") end
if aff=="mangledrightarm" then TReX.serverside.affadd("brokenrightarm") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("brokenrightarm") end
if aff=="damagedleftarm" then TReX.serverside.affadd("brokenleftarm") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("brokenleftarm") end
if aff=="damagedrighttarm" then TReX.serverside.affadd("brokenrighttarm") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("brokenrighttarm") end
if aff=="mangledleftleg" then TReX.serverside.affadd("damagedleftleg") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("damagedleftleg") end
if aff=="mangledrightleg" then TReX.serverside.affadd("brokenrightleg") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("brokenrightleg") end
if aff=="damagedleftleg" then TReX.serverside.affadd("brokenleftleg") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("brokenleftleg") end
if aff=="damagedrighttarm" then TReX.serverside.affadd("brokenrightleg") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("brokenrightleg") end
if aff=="serioustrauma" then TReX.serverside.affadd("mildtrauma") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("mildtrauma") end
if aff=="mangledhead" then TReX.serverside.affadd("damagedhead") TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("damagedhead") end
if aff=="damagedhead" then --TReX.serverside.affadd("concussion") --TReX.prios.affPrioRestore("concussion") end
if (aff == "corruption") then raiseEvent("lost corruption") end
end -- if event
end -- if installed and not override
end -- function
registerAnonymousEventHandler("TReX lost aff", "lostaff") -- [[external events]]

Script.name: gainedaff
Script.script:
gainedaff = function(event, aff) if not t.serverside.settings.sys_loaded then return end if event:find("gained aff") then raiseEvent("trackable_event got") --enableTimer("predictive curing") --enableTimer("gmcp table check")
if (aff == "retardation") then
for k, v in pairs(TReX.prios.retard_mode_curing) do if TReX.prios.current[k] ~= TReX.prios.retard_mode_curing[k] then TReX.prios.switchPrios(k,TReX.prios.retard_mode_curing[k]) end end
end
if (aff == "aeon") then if TReX.prios.current["asthma"] ~= 1 then TReX.prios.switchPrios("asthma", 1, 1) end
requestaeon = true
send("cq all", false) send("CURING BATCH OFF", false) send("CURING DEFENCES OFF", false) send("CURING SIPHEALTH 33", false) send("CURING SIPMANA 33", false) send("CURING MOSSHEALTH 0", false) send("CURING MOSSMANA 0", false)
if t.serverside["settings_default"].clot_at ~= 5000 then t.serverside["settings_default"].clot_at = 5000 t.send("") end
TReX.defs.reset()
--throw a tree check in here.
end
if (aff == "blackout") then if t.serverside["settings"].tree and TReX.affs2tree["_by_class"]["blackout"] > 0 then TReX.serverside.autoTreeOn() end -- if blackout and tree enabled set to a count of 1 in the menu
t.bals["tree"] = false
if treeTimer then return end treeTimer = tempTimer(15, [[ raiseEvent("trackable_event gained") raiseEvent("TReX gained bal", "tree") treeTimer = nil if t.affs.blackout then -- just in case we in black out and timer overlapped. if t.bals.tree and t.serverside["settings"].tree then t.serverside.red_echo("Tree Fired") t.tree() end end
]])
end -- if blackout
if (aff == "corruption") then TReX.cooldown.corruption = 0 raiseEvent("got corruption") end -- if corruption
if TReX.serverside.am_free() then for _,v in pairs({"Runewarden","Infernal","Paladin","Blademaster"}) do if TReX.s.class == v then if t.serverside["settings"].rage then if t.stacks["rage"] >= 1 and (t.bals.rage) then t.rage() end end end end end-- if rage
for _,v in pairs({"Runewarden","Infernal","Paladin","Blademaster","Sentinel","Blademaster","Monk","Druid"}) do if TReX.s.class == v then if t.serverside["settings"].fitness then if t.stacks["fitness"] >= 1 and (t.bals.fitness) then t.fitness() end end end end
if TReX.s.class == "Serpent" then if t.stacks["shrugging"] >= 1 and (t.bals.shrugging) and not (t.affs.weariness) and not (t.bals.tree) then if t.serverside["settings"].shrugging then -- tshow settings t.shrugging() end end-- if shrugging end
for _,v in pairs({"Sentinel","Druid"}) do if TReX.s.class == v then if t.stacks["might"] >= 1 and (t.bals.might) and not (t.bals.tree) then if t.serverside["settings"].might then -- tshow settings t.might() end end-- if might end end
if TReX.s.class == "Magi" then if t.stacks["bloodboil"] >= 1 and (t.bals.bloodboil) and not (t.affs.haemophilia) and not (t.affs.brokenleftarm and t.affs.brokenrightarm) then if t.serverside["settings"].bloodboil then -- tshow settings t.bloodboil() end end end -- if bloodboil
end -- if event --end -- if standing or writhing end -- function
registerAnonymousEventHandler("TReX gained aff", "gainedaff") -- [[external events]]

Script.name: hl.support
Script.script:
-- credit to http://lua-users.org/wiki/SplitJoin if hl == nil then hl = {} end
function hl.split(str, pat) local t = {} local fpat = "(.-)" .. pat local last_end = 1 local s, e, cap = str:find(fpat, 1) while s do if s ~= 1 or cap ~= "" then table.insert(t,cap) end last_end = e+1 s, e, cap = str:find(fpat, last_end) end if last_end <= #str then cap = str:sub(last_end) table.insert(t, cap) end return t end
function hl.readOnly (t) local proxy = {} local mt = { -- create metatable __index = t, __newindex = function (t,k,v) error("attempt to update a read-only table", 2) end } setmetatable(proxy, mt) return proxy end
function hl.trim(s) return (s:gsub("^%s*(.-)%s*$", "%1")) end
function hl.countIndexes(table) local count = 0
for _,_ in pairs(table) do count = count + 1 end return count end

Script.name: hl.main
Script.script:
--[[ Data storage: - hl.enemyList_ids stores the names being highlighted with trigger IDs as the value keys, unique to each session. - HighlighterVariables.lua is used for storage on disk. --]]
if hl == nil then hl = {} end
function hl.load(tempList) if string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" then _sep = "/" else _sep = "\\" end local l_SettingsFile = getMudletHomeDir() .. _sep .. "HighlighterVariables.lua" if (io.exists(l_SettingsFile)) then table.load(l_SettingsFile, tempList) end
end
function hl.save() if string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/" then _sep = "/" else _sep = "\\" end local l_SettingsFile = getMudletHomeDir() .. _sep .. "HighlighterVariables.lua"
local temp = {} local i = 1 for k,v in pairs(hl.enemyList_ids) do temp[i] = k i = i + 1 end
table.save(l_SettingsFile, temp or {}) end
function hl.clearTriggers() if hl.enemyList_ids == nil then return end
local status = true for k,v in pairs(hl.enemyList_ids) do status = killTrigger(tostring(v)) if not status then echo("Failed to delete #" .. v) end end
hl.enemyList_ids = {} end
function hl.readEnemies(enemyMap) if hl.enemyList_ids then hl.clearTriggers(hl.enemyList_ids) end
hl.enemyList_ids = {}
for k,v in ipairs(enemyMap) do hl.enemyList_ids[v] = tempTrigger(v, [[hl.highlightEnemy(matches[1])]]) end
setFgColor(255,200,100) echo( "\n\nYour enemy highlighter list is updated.\n") resetFormat() end
function hl.highlightEnemy( who ) if hl.paused then return end
local c = 1; local k = 1; while k > 0 do if c > 3 then break; end; k = string.find( line, who, k ) if k == nil then return; end local nC = ""; nC = string.match( line, ".",k+string.len(who) ) if nC == "." or nC == "," or nC == ";" or nC == ":" or nC == " " then k = selectString(who, c) if k > -1 then c = c + 1; setFgColor(255,0,0); if hl.raid then setBgColor(90,0,0) end resetFormat(); else return end end k = k + string.len(who); end end
function hl.init() if hl.loaded then return end
-- Default values hl.paused = false hl.raid = false
hl.loaded = true hl.enemyList_ids = hl.enemyList_ids or {} tempList = {} hl.load(tempList)
if #tempList == 0 then return end for k,v in ipairs(tempList) do hl.enemyList_ids[v] = tempTrigger(v, [[hl.highlightEnemy(matches[1])]]) end
end
hl.init()

Script.name: hl.API
Script.script:
function hl.isEnemy(name) if hl.enemyList_ids[name] ~= nil then return true end
return false end

Script.name: hl.finish
Script.script: hl.readOnly(hl)
